Text.Text: The Advanced Paper Mill allows you to industrially produce paper using a variety of different manufacturing processes: The more advanced the process, the greater the output.

Invented in the second half of the 19th century, it enabled the efficient splitting of wood for the first time by adding a compound of lime and sulfur(dioxide). Together with this, the wood is boiled down under high pressure for several hours, then crushed and dried. The resulting wood cellulose is cheap, very pure and is therefore suitable for direct further processing into paper.

After old, worn out clothes have been shredded and pounded, they are mixed with water to make a pulp. If you dip a sieve in it, a thin layer of pulp is deposited, which, after pressing and drying, results in a sheet of paper.
Iron, copper and zinc mines produce sulfur as extra output, when this module is placed next to them. Requires coal as input. Demand per Cycle (01:30): 1t [AssetData(1010226) Text]
Sulfur dioxide can be obtained from sulfidic iron, copper and zinc ores by roasting them for several hours.
Produce paper in the Old World using different recipes
This recipe is unlocked at 750 Engineers
Paper Mill Old World Unlock Creative Mode
